info.title: Redirect
info.description: A redirect causes a visitor on a specific path on the shop's site to be automatically sent to a different location, called the target. The target can be a new path on the shop's site or a full URL. The new URL can even be on a completely different domain. Redirect paths are unique, so a shop can't have more than one redirect with the same path.

paths.description: Retrieves a list of URL redirects. Note: As of version 2019-10, this endpoint implements pagination by using links that are provided in the response header. Sending the page parameter will return an error. To learn more, see Making requests to paginated REST Admin API endpoints.
paths.summary: Retrieves a list of URL redirects

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Show only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of field names.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to show.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Show redirects with a given path.

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to after the specified ID.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Show redirects with a given target.

200.description: Retrieves a list of URL redirects

x-examples.name: Retrieve a list of all redirects

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::Redirect.all(
  session: test_session,
)

x-examples.name: Retrieve a list of URL redirects after a specified ID

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects.json?since_id=668809255" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::Redirect.all(
  session: test_session,
  since_id: "668809255",
)

paths.description: Creates a redirect. When you provide a full URL as the value of the path property, it will be saved as an absolute path without the domain. For example, "path": "http://www.johns-apparel.com/springwear" will be saved as "path": "springwear".

target: can't be the same as path

response.body: {"errors":{"path":["can't be blank"],"target":["can't be blank","can't be the same as path"]}}

x-examples.name: Creating a redirect without a path or target fails and returns an error

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"redirect":{"body":"foobar"}}' \
-X POST "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

redirect = ShopifyAPI::Redirect.new(session: test_session)
redirect.body = "foobar"
redirect.save()

curl -d '{"redirect":{"path":"/ipod","target":"/pages/itunes"}}' \
-X POST "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

redirect = ShopifyAPI::Redirect.new(session: test_session)
redirect.path = "/ipod"
redirect.target = "/pages/itunes"
redirect.save()

x-examples.name: Create a redirect using a full URL for the path, which will be saved as an absolute path without a domain

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"redirect":{"path":"http://www.apple.com/forums","target":"http://forums.apple.com"}}' \
-X POST "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

redirect = ShopifyAPI::Redirect.new(session: test_session)
redirect.path = "http://www.apple.com/forums"
redirect.target = "http://forums.apple.com"
redirect.save()

paths.description: Retrieves a count of URL redirects
paths.summary: Retrieves a count of URL redirects

200.description: Retrieves a count of URL redirects

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects/count.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::Redirect.count(
  session: test_session,
)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Show only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of field names.

x-examples.name: Retrieve a single redirect by its ID

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects/668809255.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::Redirect.find(
  session: test_session,
  id: 668809255,
)

x-examples.name: Update the source (path) URI of a redirect

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"redirect":{"id":668809255,"path":"/tiger"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects/668809255.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

redirect = ShopifyAPI::Redirect.new(session: test_session)
redirect.id = 668809255
redirect.path = "/tiger"
redirect.save()

x-examples.name: Update the target URI of a redirect

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"redirect":{"id":668809255,"target":"/pages/macpro"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects/668809255.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

redirect = ShopifyAPI::Redirect.new(session: test_session)
redirect.id = 668809255
redirect.target = "/pages/macpro"
redirect.save()

x-examples.name: Update both the source (path) and target URIs of a redirect

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -d '{"redirect":{"id":950115854,"path":"/powermac","target":"/pages/macpro"}}' \
-X PUT "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects/950115854.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

redirect = ShopifyAPI::Redirect.new(session: test_session)
redirect.id = 950115854
redirect.path = "/powermac"
redirect.target = "/pages/macpro"
redirect.save()

curl -X DELETE "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-04/redirects/668809255.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
  is_online: true
)

ShopifyAPI::Redirect.delete(
  session: test_session,
  id: 668809255,
)

properties.description: The old path to be redirected. When the user visits this path, they will be redirected to the target. (maximum: 1024 characters)
properties.name: path

properties.description: The target location where the user will be redirected. When the user visits the old path specified by the path property, they will be redirected to this location. This property can be set to any path on the shop's site, or to an external URL. (maximum: 255 characters)
properties.name: target

x-shopify-meta.meta_description: Manage 301 redirects for a merchant's online store.
